item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I’m Khaled, just a regular person with a love for technology, especially cybersecurity and cloud computing. I started this blog to share my knowledge and experiences in the tech world, and I hope to learn from others along the way. With some years of experience, I’ve had the opportunity to work on some exciting projects, but I’m always humbled by how much there is still to learn. That’s why I’m here, to share what I know and learn from others in this amazing community.

item.title: Azure RBAC 101
item.description: I’m getting started with Azure. After a couple of years playing with GCP and Azure, I thought it’s time to play with Azure. I hope I can reach a good depth and be able to compare the 3 cloud providers in future posts! I don’t promise anything but I’ll do my best :) What the heck is Azure RBAC ? RBAC stands for Role-Based Access Control. In short it’s used to manage access to ressources.
